definition: This version of the ? Raised Fist emoji has the ?? Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin Tone on supporte http://emojipedia.org/raised-fist-type-3/
name: raised fist: medium-light skin tone

bn:00091762v: To strike something or someone with one's fist.
To deliver a blow with the fist.

bn:00090128v: To deliver a sharp blow or push.
Deliver a sharp blow or push :"He knocked the glass clear across the room"

bn:00034565n: One of the long extremities of the hand, sometimes excluding the thumb.
One of the long extremities of the hand that is used for gripping objects.
Any of the terminal members of the hand (sometimes excepting the thumb)
Organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates
A finger is a limb of the human body and a type of digit, an organ of manipulation and sensation found in the hands of humans and other primates.

bn:00042759n: That part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in primates (including humans).
The part of the fore limb below the forearm or wrist in a human, and the corresponding part in many other animals.
The zoological term for the distal portion of the forelimb of an animal (including the human hand)
The (prehensile) extremity of the superior limb
The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.
A hand, as the part of the fore limb below the forearm in a man, or the corresponding part in other vertebrates.
A hand is a prehensile, multi-fingered extremity located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates such as humans, chimpanzees, monkeys, and lemurs.

bn:00019718n: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the medium-light skin tone raised fist emoji stands as a powerful symbol of solidarity and defiance, rendered with Apple‚Äôs characteristic bold 3D shading and crisp definition.  Its surface exhibits a subtle sheen, highlighting the smooth, rounded knuckles and the firm, determined angle of the arm.  This emoji, appearing with realistic lighting that emphasizes its muscular form, conveys strength, support, and a collective spirit of activism.
